channel.title: Delivery Art Jutsu
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Delivery Art Jutsu" - its not worked on Dou Quest ???

item.title: Re: Delivery Art Jutsu
item.content:encoded: Jutsus can't reduce stamina below 0 stamina, but you shouldn't be able to select them at all.

item.title: Re: Delivery Art Jutsu
item.content:encoded: Probably missing the 100 stamina needed for the jutsu

item.title: Delivery Art Jutsu
item.content:encoded:
i am Jonin right now.

i try to finish my LtS Quest mission. ( last age i can finish this mission easly ).
and i use delivery art jutsu : -100 sta, +10 Dou Range.
but nothing happen. i didn't lose my stamina and my Dou Range not increased.

am i missing something here?
ty
